title: Malware types encountered during data compromise investigations 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type Of Malware, and Share of encounters in each Type Of Malware on the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
The Share of encounters of Type Of Malware Downloader is 18.57% larger than the minimum value at Ransomware.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type Of Malware in the x axis and Share of encounters in the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type Of Malware, and Share of encounters in each Type Of Malware on the y axis.
Type Of Malware Downloader has the highest Share of encounters and Ransomware has the lowest Share of encounters.
The Share of encounters of Type Of Malware Downloader is 18.57% larger than the minimum value at Ransomware.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type Of Malware in the x axis and Share of encounters in the y axis.
The maximum Share of encounters 13.0 is found at Type Of Malware Downloader and the minimum is found at Ransomware where Type Of Malware is 0.7.
The second highest Share of encounters is appeared to be the Type Of Malware Remote administration tool (RAT).
The Share of encounters of Type Of Malware Downloader is 18.57% larger than the minimum value at Ransomware.

Type Of Malware Downloader is higher than any other Type Of Malwares with value 13.0, followed by Remote administration tool (RAT), and Memory scraper/dumper. Down to Type Of Malware Ransomware with the lowest value 0.7.
Type Of Malware Webshell, and Memory scraper/dumper have the same Share of encounters.
The highest value 13.0 at Downloader is almost 2.18 times larger than the average value 5.97.
Summing up the values of all Type Of Malwares, we get total 53.7.
